title: Effect of pore structure in bismuth metal–organic framework nanorod derivatives on adsorption and organic pollutant degradation
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31171-31182
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05657D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Vy Anh Tran, Tran Thanh Sang, Nguyen Anh Thu, Vien Vo, Van Thuan Le, Van Dat Doan, Thu-Thao Thi Vo, Nguyen Duy Dat
This study explores the synthesis, characterization, and photocatalytic properties of bismuth metal–organic framework (Bi-MOF) nanorods and their derivatives such as Ag/Bi-MOF and Ag/Bi2O3.
